Many hosting companies can offer you great prices. Very few can
offer great prices and great support. We are always here to take
your phone calls or answer your support tickets. Our staff is very
friendly and will always treat you with respect and always willing
to talk with you.

All Little Creek Hosting Shared Hosting plans include:

- Cpanel or DirectAdmin Control Panel
- Softaculous Auto Script Installer with 100+ apps
- Free setup
- Daily Backups
- Free Pro-Active Monitoring
- Unlimited POP3 Emails
- Unlimited Email Aliases
- Apache Webserver
- PHP 5.6.x
- Perl 5.16.x
- MySQL 5.5
- 99.9% Uptime guarantee
- 24/7 Support via phone and ticket system
- Free SSL Certificates via Let's Encrypt
- Money Back Guarantee

Get 50% off all Shared Hosting services using promo code 7OIMOU91F4.
After the 50% off the prices start at $1.98/month.

https://littlecreekhosting.com/shared-hosting/
